channel.title: Properly showing an interface
channel.description:
I've helped my fair share of people, help me :(
When I use iron ore with a furnace, it shows the interface 2400. But the interface shows up at the TOP of my client, therfore useless. Maybe it would work, but when I click smelt 1, 5, 10, or X, nothin happens. Do I have to add somethin else for it to work? Or is 2400 the wrong id?
Thanks

item.title: Properly showing an interface
item.dc:creator: @Taylor_John0 Taylor John0
item.description:
@Taylor_John0 wrote:

[code]public void carb(){
if (actionTimer == 0)
{
addItem(363,1);
sendMessage(“You catch a bass.”);
addSkillXP((10*playerLevel[10]), 10);
actionName = “carp”;
actionTimer = 10;
pEmote = 0x306;
updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
}
}
if(useItemID == 440 && atObjectID == 2781)
{
sendFrame164(2400);
}

public void iron(){
if (actionTimer == 0)
{
sendFrame164(2400);
sendMessage(“You make an iron bar.”);
addSkillXP((10playerLevel[13]), 13);
actionName = “iron”;
actionTimer = 10;
startAnimation(0x383);
updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
}
}
public void stick(){
if (actionTimer == 0)
{
sendMessage(“You whacked the cow!”);
addSkillXP((14playerLevel[18]), 18);
actionName = “stick”;
actionTimer = 10;
startAnimation(0x422);
updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
}
}[/code][br][size=1]Posted on: August 21, 2007, 11:15:22 PM[/size][hr]Come back, you’ve got the left hand and the spoon!

Can sendFrame218 have one (int)?

line 16074: can’t find symbol
symbol being the method sendFrame218(int)

else if(useItemID == 440 && (atObjectID == 2781 || atObjectID == 11666)) { sendFrame218(2400); }

^ under the ‘s’ in sendFrame

Read full topic

item.title: Properly showing an interface
item.dc:creator: @Taylor_John0 Taylor John0
item.description:
@Taylor_John0 wrote:

opens mouth, awaiting arrival of airplane
It’s sendFrame164, correct?

public void iron(){ if (actionTimer == 0) { sendFrame164(2400); sendMessage("You make an iron bar."); addSkillXP((10*playerLevel[13]), 13); actionName = "iron"; actionTimer = 10; startAnimation(0x383); updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; } }
Now, when I click iron on the interface, nothing happens.
I must add something, but can the air plane tell me what?
Cuz clicking smelt x does nothing

Read full topic

item.title: Properly showing an interface
item.dc:creator: @ownage_plz ownage plz
item.description:
@ownage_plz wrote:

[quote=“Miss Silabsoft”]Example usage:
This will load the bank interface in the chatbar

sendFrame218(4465);[/quote]

That’s how you’re supposed to do it …

sendFrame218(interfaceID);

Read full topic
